SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rno, s.* FROM ( SELECT br.serial serial, br.rUserId rUserId,
to_char(br.rDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') rDate, br.reportType reportType,
bd.userId userId,
bd.category category, bd.title title,
bd.isBlocked isBlocked
FROM DBOARD_REPORTLIST br JOIN DBOARD bd ON br.fSerial = bd.serial
WHERE br.isDelete = 0
WHERE to_char(br.rDate, 'YYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYMMDD') AND br.isDelete = 0

WHERE to_char(br.rDate, 'YYMMDD') > to_char(add_months(sysdate, -1), 'YYMMDD') AND br.isDelete = 0
ORDER BY br.rDate desc ) s ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
